ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Xit MB-D14 Battery Grip + <5> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <6> Spare EN-EL15 Battery +
<7> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <9> Universal Pop-Up Diffuser + <10> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote +
<11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
